title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Covered Bonds)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Covered Bonds) 

Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (covered bonds) regulation 2023

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Section 3 of the Asset Covered Securities Act 2001 (No. 47 of 2001) is
text_raw:
2. Section 3 of the Asset Covered Securities Act 2001 (No. 47 of 2001) is 
amended, in subsection (1), by the substitution of the following definition for the 
definition of ‘covered bond programme’: 

“‘covered bond programme’ means a programme of issues of asset 
covered securities– 

(a) 

for which permission has been granted under section 26B, 
and 

(b) which is in compliance with this Act;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 August, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L. 328, 18.12.2019, p. 29. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th August, 2023.
